<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of a terminal capable to output Unicode characters.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Gets the number of positions the UTF8-encoded \\p Text is likely to occupy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// when output on a terminal (&quot;character width&quot;). This depends on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implementation of the terminal, and there&#39;s no standard definition of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// character width.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The implementation defines it in a way that is expected to be compatible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with a generic Unicode-capable terminal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return Character width:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#42; ErrorNonPrintableCharacter (-1) if \\p Text contains non-printable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     characters (as identified by isPrintable);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#42; 0 for each non-spacing and enclosing combining mark;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#42; 2 for each CJK character excluding halfwidth forms;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#42; 1 for each of the remaining characters.</span></CodeLine>
